Wine glass wind chime: Drill a hole in the bottom of the wine glass and attach it to a metal ring or a metal stick. Hang the wine glass from a string and use it as a wind chime.
Wine glass candle holder: Place a tea light candle inside the wine glass and use it as a unique and elegant candle holder.
Wine glass vase: Clean and cut the bottom off of the wine glass and use it as a small vase for flowers or greenery.
Wine glass soap dispenser: Fill the wine glass with liquid soap and use it as a decorative soap dispenser in the bathroom.
Wine glass pencil holder: Clean and cut the wine glass and use it as a pencil holder on your desk or office.
